title: Slender: The Arrival
notes: the game get stuck in a black screen.

title: Slender: The Arrival
notes: Requires Steam launch option "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" to Run. Set the game to Windowed mode on the launcher, in fullscreen the game gets stuck between loading screens (just a black screen as someone else reported, but you can make it continue by alt+tab between desktop and game). In windowed mode the game runs without problems.
You need to set the game to run on Windowed mode. in full screen he get out of focus everytime
title: Slender: The Arrival
